forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
